items.title: Portfolio Website
items.description: A modern responsive portfolio built with clean UI and animations.

items.title: Alif Tools
items.description:
ALIF Tools is a modern, fast, and privacy-focused online platform for processing PDF and image files with ease.
It is designed to be simple, secure, and completely free for everyone.

items.title: BG Remover
items.description:
Background Remover is a tool to remove backgrounds from images easily and quickly.
It is designed to be simple, secure, and completely free for everyone.

items.title: Hall Dining Management System
items.description:
Hall Dining Management System is a web application designed to streamline the management of dining services in university halls.
It provides an efficient way to handle reservations, orders, and inventory.

items.title: Admission Tool Hub
items.description: Admission Tools Hub is a comprehensive web platform that centralizes all essential tools for university admissions. It offers a variety of features to assist students in managing their application process efficiently.

items.title: E - Commerce Website
items.description: E-Commerce Website is a modern and responsive online store built with HTML and CSS. It features a clean UI design and smooth animations to enhance user experience

items.title: Password Generator
items.description: Password Generator is a tool to generate strong and secure passwords with customizable options.

items.title: Vehicle Management Dashboard
items.description: Vehicle Management Dashboard is a web application that provides a centralized platform for managing vehicle information, tracking maintenance schedules, and monitoring vehicle performance.

items.title: MNR Task Manager
items.description: MNR Task Manager is a web application designed to help manage tasks efficiently within the MNR organization.

items.title: Cash Book System
items.description: Cash Book is a modern, mobile-friendly web app that lets you easily manage your daily expenses, budget and multiple wallets (Bank / Bikash / Cash etc.).
